      Setting

      Pre-event EntryAllow people to enter the event before it opens so they can network and agenda meetings
      Event ReplayKeep your event open after it has ended for people to watch the recordings
      Live StreamAdd now to enable streaming out to 3rd party platforms
      Add stream destination
      Please choose source
      • Youtube Channel
      • Custom RTMP
      • Facebook Page
      • Facebook Profile
      Custom DomainAdd the domain name you want to customize
      Add

      Add a RTMP stream destination

      You need an RTMP server URL and stream key of your destination.
      We recommend doing a quick web search on how to find “your destination’s” stream key.

      Streaming/server URL*
      Your streaming URL is a unique web address, which carries your live stream every time you have an ongoing session
      Stream Key*
      Stream key is a code that “your destination” will use to indentify the live stream via Eventure.
      Live stream page URL*
      This is the page URL where the live stream will be broadcasted. Everyone who uses this link can view the live broadcast.
      Destination Nickname*
      A nickname helps you to easily find the RTMP stream destination on Eventure.
